title: Chile Cuts Key Rate to 4.5% as Inflation Outlook Improves
description: Chile’s central bank cut its key interest rate by a quarter point for the second time this year, pushing it back into the neutral range for the first time since the pandemic, as the inflation outlook improves.
content: Chile’s central bank cut its key interest rate by a quarter point for the second time this year, pushing it back into the neutral range for the first time since the pandemic, as the inflation outlook improves.
